attributes.action: Endorse and celebrate Donald Trump's State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
The petition stating the State Visit would be an embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen is second guessing Her Majesty's point of view and an attempt to use our monarchy as a political porn. 

The USA and UK share a uniquely special relationship.  To strengthen that relationship and secure trade deals etc Donald Trump should be welcomed, with open arms, into the United Kingdom for the official State Visit.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government and his invite to make an official State Visit should be upheld and celebrated.
